com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class SbnFile

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.SbnFile
public class SbnFile
extends Object

Manages a spatial index file. These files have the extensions of *.SBN and *.SBX.

If you wish to search for features using the index, then the proper calling sequence is to use the openReadOnly() method to open the index. Then you may use the search() method as many times as you like. When you have finished, use the close() method to close the index.

If you wish to create an index, the the proper calling sequence is to use the openNew() method first. Then you may use the addFeature() method to add the appropriate number of features to the index. When you have finished, use the close() method to close the index. The index file will be created after the close() method is called.

Field Detail

LITTLE_ENDIAN

public static final int LITTLE_ENDIAN
used to create spatial indexes in little endian format. This is the format used with PcArc indexes (version 3.4)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

BIG_ENDIAN

public static final int BIG_ENDIAN
used to create spatial indexes in big endian format. This is the normal orientation of the file.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
